name: "Chipper" Ironbane

name: A'dal
effect: Prevent all damage that would be dealt.

effect: When Ahune enters play, he deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally for this and each other Frost and card you control.

effect: The arcanite reaper was long the mark of a true warrior in Azeroth. Having one crafted was like a rite of passage.

Pay 6 to complete this quest.

effect: Talent: Retribution

"The tide has begun to turn. The Prophet has led us here to join your valiant fight. By the Light, we must prevail."

name: Nok'tal the Savage
effect:
Protector
Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)
"Is dat all you got?"

name: Nyn'jah
effect: When Nyn'jah enters play, you may ready target opposing equipment. You control that equipment while Nyn'jah remains in your party.
"I'll take that."

name: Offender Gora
effect:
Ferocity
Gora has -2 ATK during each opponent's turn.
"Patience is not a traditional value of the orcs."

name: Orders From Lady Vashj
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: If you have no cards in hand, draw two cards.

name: Parvink
effect:
Protector
When Parvink enters play, draw a card.
Tauren warriors stand between their allies and death. Gnomes keep death from walking that far.

name: Penelope's Rose
effect: When you complete a quest, draw a card.
A rose by this name is twice as sweet.

name: Piercing Howl
effect: Talent: Fury
A warrior's deafening howl can break an enemy's ranks from within.

name: Plagueborn Meatwall
effect:
Protector
When Plagueborn Meatwall defends against an ally, remove all damage from Plagueborn Meatwall, and he deals that much melee damage to each attacking ally.
The meat wagons bring bodies to the slaughterhouse to make unthinkable horrors.

name: Polymorph
effect: Talent: Arcane
"Baaaaa."

name: Power (2011 Showdown: Goblins of Anarchy)
effect:
Time is Money

On your turn: → Your hero and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn for each Biker you control.

name: Power Word: Courage
effect: Talent: Dscipline
"My power is a gift. I am an instrument of the Light." - Gladiator Katianna

name: Prince Kael'thas Sunstrider
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
At the end of your turn, gain control of all ready opposing resources. (Move them to your resource row.)
"Welcomeâ€¦to the future. A pity you are too late to stop it. No one can stop me now! Selama ashal'amore!"

name: Puncture
effect: Talent: Protection

name: PX-238 Winter Wondervolt
effect:
Choose an ally type.
Ongoing: All allies also have that type. (Examples of types are Chicken, Demon, Druid, Gnome, and Yeti.)
"You mean there's a setting to this thing other than 'gnome'?"

name: Rak Skyfury
effect: When Rak Skyfury enters play, ready your hero and one of your weapons.

name: Redemption
effect: Talent: Holy
"The Light conquers even the darkness of death." - Thatia Truthbringer

name: Rescue the Survivors!
effect:
Draenei Hero Required
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Put two Draenei Survivor ally tokens into play with 0 ATK, 1 health, and "Exhaust your hero, remove this ally from the game ==> Draw a card."
"We'll survive this yet with your help." - Zalduun

name: Rise to the Challenge
effect:
Attach to your hero and remove all damage from it.
Draw cards until you reach your maximum hand size.
Ongoing: Attached hero has +10 health.

name: Runesong Dagger
effect:
When you draw a card, put a verse counter on Runesong Dagger.
1, Remove three verse counters ==> Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target ally.
Its lyrics are a chorus of death.

name: Sayge
effect: At the start of your turn, remove the top card of target opponent's deck from the game. If it's an ability, ally, or equipment card, you may play it this game. (Pay costs as normal.)
"The longer you wait, the less future you have for me to foretell."

name: Scaramanga
effect: 2, Destroy Scaramanga ==> Draw a card.
"Ours is the loneliest profession."

name: Scorch
effect: Talent: Fire
All magi are pyromaniacs...at least a little bit.

name: Scout Omerrta
effect: Protector
"Stay here while I check out the path ahead."

name: Seamus Somerset
effect:
Ferocity
When Seamus attacks, you may remove target card in a graveyard from the game.
"Can it wait? I'm busy here."

name: Shadow Bolt
effect: Talent: Destruction
"May darkness take you, for when I'm done, the Light will not recognize you." - Radak Doombringer

name: Shadow Tactics
effect: Talent: Assassination
"Of course I am more comfortable in darkness than in the light." - Gladiator Meganna

name: Shadowfiend
effect:
Ferocity
When Shadowfiend deals combat damage to a hero, ready one of your resources.
At the end of your turn, put Shadowfiend into its owner's hand.

name: Shadowprowler's Chestguard
effect: Your hero has +1 ATK while attacking for each hero and ally in your party with stealth.
The most vicious attackers dwell in the shadows.

name: Shredder
effect: Preparation (On your first turn, you may play this card without paying its cost.)
"Shelly and Shredder just never seem to get along." - Gladiator Magnus

name: Silas Darkmoon
effect: Silas has ATK equal to the combined ATK of all other allies in your party, and health equal to the combined health of all other allies in your party.
"Greetings, my friendâ€¦I want to welcome you to the greatest show on Azeroth!"

name: Silencing Shot
effect: Talent: Marksmanship

name: Sinister Squashling (Holiday Promos: Aftermath Block)
effect: At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck. If you revealed an ability, ally, or equipment this turn, this ally has +ATK this turn equal to the cost of that revealed card.
"Soldiers arise! Stand and fight! Bring victory at last to this fallen knight!" - Headless Horseman

name: Solanian's Belongings
effect:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Choose one: Put an ability card from your graveyard on top of your deck; or draw a card. If your hero is a Blood Elf, you may choose both.

name: Spellsteal
effect: Talent: Arcane
Rogues aren't the only thieves in Azeroth.

name: Spellstrike Hood
effect: 2, [Activate] ==> When you next play a non-ongoing ability this turn, copy it. (You may choose new targets for the copy.)
"Twice the power for half the price." - Varanis Bitterstar

name: Spirit Healer
effect: Ongoing: At the end of each player's turn, that player may put an ally card from his graveyard into play with damage on it equal to its health minus 1.
"It is not yet your time. I shall aid your journey back to the realm of the living."

name: Spring Rabbit (Holiday Promos: Aftermath Block)
effect: (1), Exhaust this and another Rabbit ally you control → Put a 1 / 1 Bunny Egg ally token into play.

name: Spymaster Thalodien
effect:
Scryer Reputation, Sabotage: Deck
When Thalodien sabotages a deck, reveal cards from the top until you reveal a non-quest card. Remove that card from the game and put the rest on the bottom. You may play that card without paying its play cost this turn. If it has X in its play cost, X is 0.)
"My tactics are not subtle, but they work."

name: Stellaris
effect: Exhaust an ally in your party ==> You pay 1 less the next time you strike with Stellaris this turn.

name: Surprise Attacks
effect: Talent: Combat
"You need not always be hidden to get the upper hand in a fight." - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 8

name: Swiftsteel Bracers
effect: You pay 5 less to strike with weapons.
"The armor is flawless. Perhaps your weapon is not." - Graccus

name: Swipe
effect: Talent: Feral
"Maybe forming into a line wasn't such a good idea."

name: Talasite Owl
effect:
Jewelcrafting Hero Required
[Activate] ==> Put a hoot counter on Talasite Owl.
[Activate], Remove X hoot counters, destroy Talasite Owl ==> Ready X of your resources.

name: Tankatronic Goggles
effect:
Engineering Hero Required
When Tankatronic Goggles enters play, look at target player's hand.
Your hero is a protector. Opposing allies lose and can't have elusive, stealth, and untargetable.

name: Tatulla the Reclaimer
effect: When Tatulla enters play, target player destroys an ability or equipment he controls.

name: Taz'dingo
effect: When Taz'Dingo enters play, he deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Tempest, Son-of-Storms
effect: When Tempest enters play, ready a hero or ally in your party.

name: Tewa Wildmane
effect: Tewa Wildmane has +1 ATK and +1 health for each face-down resource you have.

name: The Abominable Greench
effect: If an opponent would draw a card, you draw one instead.
He's a mean one . . .

name: The Bringer of Death
effect: 3, [Activate], Destroy The Bringer of Death ==> Destroy all abilities, allies, and equipment. Use only on your turn.

name: The Darkmoon Faire
effect:
1, [Activate], Discard a card ==> Draw a card.
At the start of your turn, if you control cards in play with costs 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8, you win the game.
"We have it allâ€¦delicious food, strong drink, exotic artifacts, fortunes read, amazing prizes, and excitement without end!" - Silas Darkmoon

name: The Defias Brotherhood
effect:
While there are four or more allies in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw two cards.
"There is but one task left for you to complete. Edwin VanCleef must be assassinated." - Gryan Stoutmantle

name: The Dying Balance
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. If they have different card types, put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of your deck. Otherwise, put both on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Formation of Felbane
effect:
Pay 7 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability, ally, equipment, and quest card into your hand
and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Last Barov
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if two or more allies have the same name.

name: The Natural Order
effect: Talent: Balance

name: The Princess Trapped
effect:
Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the other one on the bottom of your deck.
"That's no princess."

name: The Reason for the Season
effect:
During your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. If it's December, draw another card.
"As Greatfather Winter walked Azeroth, bringing winter in his wake, it was said he would provide a bounty for those who welcomed his presence." - The Feast of Winter Veil

name: The Root of All Evil
effect:
During your turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Turn target quest face down.
"Only the essence of the fallen demon will begin the lengthy healing process of the Winterfall tribeâ€¦and the salvation of Timbermaw Hold." - Gorn One Eye

name: Through the Dark Portal
effect:
During your turn, pay 13 to complete this quest.
Reward: Remove your deck and graveyard from the game. Build a new ten-card deck using cards from your entire collection.

name: Through the Dark Portal
effect:
During your turn, pay 13 to complete this quest.
Reward: Remove your deck and graveyard from the game. Build a new ten-card deck using cards from your entire collection.

name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker
effect: When you strike with Thunderfury, choose up to five heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 5, 4, 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.
The fury of Thunderaan rages between the folded metal.

name: Thundering Footsteps
effect: As an additional cost to play Thundering Footsteps, stomp your feet. Put a Mechanical ally token named Fel Reaver with 10 ATK / 10 health into play.
"Do you hear something?"

name: Time (2011 Showdown: Goblins of Anarchy)
effect:
Time is Money

On your turn: → For each Biker you control, put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and ready.

name: Torek's Assault
effect:
If an opposing hero was dealt damage this turn by an ally in your party, pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.
"What do you say? Are you with us?" - Torek

name: Touch of Darkness
effect: Talent: Shadow
Even a brush with the shadow can teat a mind apart.

name: Treats for Great-father Winter
effect:
Pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. Then, you may discard a Gingerbread Cookie card. If you do, search your deck for a Feast of Winter Veil card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
"Here's a little somethingâ€¦you know, for the effort." - Great-father Winter

name: Twig of the World Tree
effect: Destroy one of your resources ==> You pay 3 less the next time you strike with Twig of the World Tree this turn.
Great power pulses and hums beneath the bark of such a simple branch.

name: Unen Rataan
effect: 2, Destroy Unen Rataan ==> Ready your hero and all of your weapons.
"I cannot defeat them, but I can buy you time. Do not waste it."

name: Vanish
effect: Talent: Subtlety
Now you see himâ€¦

name: Varanis Bitterstar
effect: Talent: Arcane
Professions: Enchanting, Jewelcrafting
"The Scourge invaded Quel'Thalas and slaughtered many of our people. We will have vengeance. Join us, or get out of our way."

name: Varanis Bitterstar
effect: Talent: Arcane
Professions: Enchanting, Jewelcrafting
"The Scourge invaded Quel'Thalas and slaughtered many of our people. We will have vengeance. Join us, or get out of our way."

name: Varimathras
effect: At the end of your turn, Varimathras deals 5 shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally. When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
"I'm always on the winning side."

name: Vindicator Enkallus
effect: Protector
"Spirits of this land, hear my call!"

name: Vorden the Shadowbringer
effect: When Vorden enters play, destroy any number of allies in your party, then destroy an opposing ally for each ally destroyed this way.

name: Warchief Thrall
effect: Other Horde allies in your party have +3 ATK and +3 health.
"Lok'Tar, friend. Have you come to serve the Horde?"

name: Warlord Kalithresh
effect:
Traitor Hero Required
At the end of your turn, put a Naga Distiller ally token with 0 Mele ATK / 1 health into play.
At the start of your turn, destroy a Naga Distiller in your party.
If you do, Kalithresh has +5 ATK this turn.

name: Warp Splinter's Thorn
effect:
Your hero has dual wield.
1, Destroy on of your Daggers ==> Your hero deals 2 damage to target ally.

name: Waz'luk
effect: When Waz'luk enters play, he deals 1 fire damage to target hero.
He makes quite a first impression.

name: Weeble
effect:
Protector
When Weeble enters play, draw two cards.
Many foes have fallen to Weeble's wrath.

name: Windseer Tarus
effect: When Windseer Tarus attacks for the first time each turn, you may pay 1. If you do, ready him.

name: Winter Garb (Holiday Promos: Timewalkers Block)
effect:
(2), → Put a 0 / 1 Present ally token into play with "This ally can't attack."

When a Present you control is destroyed, reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand.
Jingle bells, jingle bells ...
attributes: • Class: Death Knight Druid Hunter Mage Paladin Priest Rogue Shaman Warlock Warrior

name: Winter Veil Disguise Kit (Holiday Promos: Aftermath Block)
effect:
→ Target ally you control is also a Snowman this turn.

When a Snowman you control defends against a non- hero or ally, remove it from combat.
attributes: • Class: Death Knight Druid Hunter Mage Paladin Priest Rogue Shaman Warlock Warrior

name: Wolpertinger (Holiday Promos: Aftermath Block)
effect:
Elusive, Stealth, Untargetable

When this ally is destroyed, destroy your hero.
"I bet you want a reason to drink, too ..." - Glodrak Huntsniper

name: Wraith Scythe
effect: When your hero deals combat damage, it heals that amount of damage from itself.

name: Wyneth Harridan
effect:
Protector
3, [Activate] ==> Destroy target Undead ally.
"As the Light shines, so shall we."

name: Zandar Shadesprocket
effect:
Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
When Zandar is dealt damage, also put that much on your hero.

name: Zygore Bladebreaker
effect: When Zygore Bladebreaker enters play, you may destroy target armor or weapon.
